Sentencas: The influence of MgO on the chemical stability of cermets in anodic operating conditions is discussed.

Sentencas: It was found that a sufficient amount of magnesia addition (Ni-0.9(MgO)(0.1)) helps to reduce carbon deposition in dry methane.
